abstract.t: A Point-to-Multipoint (P2MP) Pseudowire (PW) is a mechanism thatemulates the essential attributes of a P2MP Telecommunicationsservice such as P2MP ATM over a Packet Switched Network (PSN).This document describes the encapsulation and data plane proceduresfor a P2MP PW. These procedures are meant to be independent of thecontrol plane used to signal a P2MP PW.
